articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: “When the Celts went up to lift the Scottish Cup, we were there, we were there!” echoed around Hampden during the second half of Saturday’s Scottish Cup final, with Celtic leading 2-0 against Inverness Caledonian Thistle.
articles.title: "When the Celts go up to lift the Scottish Cup..." But they didn't go up. Why not? Further erosion of tradition amid 'health and safety concerns'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The planned vote regarding the introduction of a new fifth tier within Scottish football has been scrapped on the eve of the Scottish FA AGM.
articles.title: Celtic, Hearts and Rangers blow as Conference League vote scrapped despite SFA chief's self interest pleas

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: The footballing cycle moves at a bewildering pace these days.
articles.title: Why Ange Postecoglou is the right fit for Tottenham and where his departure leaves Celtic

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou has taken a further step towards the Celtic exit door after agreeing terms with Tottenham Hotspur after the Premier League club were granted permission to speak to the Australian.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou 'agrees terms' with Spurs, John Kennedy's Celtic future, Brendan Rodgers return answer

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish clubs will vote on Tuesday whether to back a resolution for the introduction of a Conference League which will consist of four B teams and sit below the SPFL as a new fifth tier.
articles.title: Conference League vote: Celtic, Rangers and Hearts to discover B team future as 40 clubs signal intentions

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou has taken one step closer to leaving Celtic for Tottenham Hotspur after the Premier League club were granted permission to speak to the Australian.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Celtic give Spurs ‘permission’ for talks, John Kennedy future, Brendan Rodgers return answer

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Brendan Rodgers is in line for a shock Celtic return after being installed as the favourite to replace Ange Postecoglou.

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Brendan Rodgers is in line for a shock Celtic return after being installed as the favourite to replace Ange Postecoglou.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers favourite for shock Celtic return as familiar names appear as Ange Postecoglou replacements

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Greg Taylor admits he will have little time to dwell on Celtic's historic treble success – or his own upcoming nuptials – ahead of another big month with Scotland.
articles.title: Celtic treble winner reveals plans for own big day with just four days rest before the boots go back on

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou looks set to depart Celtic amid reports that he informed Parkhead bosses of his desire to become the next manager of Tottenham after Saturday's Scottish Cup win over Inverness.
articles.title: What Ange Postecoglou told Celtic after Scottish Cup final as 'decision made' on Tottenham interest

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Callum McGregor insists Celtic are strong enough to survive the loss of “super confident” Ange Postecoglou in the event of the manager leaving this summer.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou delivers Celtic 'parting gift' as Tottenham prepare to make their move

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Celtic’s season ripened to perfection beneath a strawberry moon on Saturday night on a historic night in the southside of Glasgow.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou gestures cause a stir as Celtic treble celebrations shrouded in uncertainty

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Three morning-after observations from the Scottish Cup final as Celtic secured a world record eighth domestic treble with a 3-1 victory over Inverness at Hampden…
articles.title: Celtic reaction: Ange Postecoglou yesterday's man, Joe Hart joins elite club, no awkward Hibs reunion

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Pointing out that the key to Scotland’s success against Norway might hinge on keeping Erling Haaland quiet is hardly earth-shattering tactical insight.
articles.title: Steve Clarke discusses strikers, Rory Wilson, Ben Doak - 'it would be nice to get one or two more for Scotland'

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Pride comes before a call, with Ange Postecoglou all lined up to have a chat about his future in the coming days. But defender Carl Starfelt said there was no hint of a farewell when he addressed the players after they wrapped up a world-record eighth treble.
articles.title: Celtic players lift lid on Ange Postecoglou post-match address as Hampden hero says: 'Maybe the Gods support me'

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou came as close to offering a valedictory address as possible without bursting the bubble of his club’s support in the wake of the 3-1 Scottish Cup triumph over Inverness Caledonian Thistle that delivered the Greek-Australian and his squad a domestic treble, snaring a world record eighth such haul for the Glasgow side.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou in revealing post-match press conference take as Celtic boss fields questions on future

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Proud manager Billy Dodds wants to guide Inverness Caledonian Thistle to the Premiership next season but admitted his own future at the club is still unclear following the 3-1 Scottish Cup final defeat by Celtic.
articles.title: Proud ICT manager Billy Dodds explains Celtic tactics and gives update on his own future

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Celtic’s victory over Inverness Caledonian Thistle in Saturday evening’s Scottish Cup final has now clarified which teams will be in Europe next season.
articles.title: When Celtic, Rangers, Aberdeen, Hearts and Hibs enter Europe after Scottish Cup final outcome

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Celtic won the Scottish Cup on Saturday evening with a 3-1 win over Inverness Caledonian Thistle.
articles.title: Scottish Cup player ratings: One Celtic standout, their weak link, Inverness save best for last

articles.author: Ross McLeish
articles.description: Celtic goalkeeper Vasilis Barkas is set to be released from his contract a year early, according to reports in Greece.
articles.title: Celtic set to let flop leave a year early in bid to 'make significant saving on wages'

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Until he arrived at Celtic, Alistair Johnston had not won a major trophy and despite picking up two in five months, the novelty still hasn’t worn off. For him or his family.
articles.title: Alistair Johnston reveals family's late Celtic dash, name being Googled and Ange Postecoglou message that has come true

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has vowed he won’t “let happen” a repeat of the tenure-wrecking Scottish Cup defeat suffered by predecessor John Barnes to Inverness Caledonian Thistle in February 2000.
articles.title: 'I'm not going to let it happen' - Celtic's Ange Postecoglou on cup final cautionary tale as he recalls Maracana motivations

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Until he arrived at Celtic, Alistair Johnston had not won a major trophy and despite picking up two in five months, the novelty still hasn’t worn off. For him or his family.
articles.title: Alistair Johnston reveals family's late Celtic dash, named being Googled and Ange Postecoglou message that has come true

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Certainly, there have been stranger things in our game than the cloak wrapping itself around Saturday’s 2023 Scottish Cup final. Just not too many more curious adornments for an occasion, an event, supposed to provide its own striking apparel.
articles.title: Celtic fans prepare for tears of joy and sadness: Postecoglou future, Spurs, Inverness' role, three clubs with vested interest

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has laid on the line he has held no talks this week with his representatives over a move to Tottenham Hotspur – even as speculation has ramped up that the Greek-Australian could be appointed by the London club within days of Saturday’s Scottish Cup final.
articles.title: 'They wouldn't dare' - Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou insists no Tottenham talks held before cup final

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish football could be dominated by the future of Ange Postecoglou at Celtic with reports he is set to become the new Spurs boss with the Scottish Cup final on the horizon. It could be the biggest story of the summer, while clubs look to make key moves in the transfer market.
